item.title: New icanhaz features: reverse DNS and traceroutes
item.description: After adding some upgrades for icanhazip.

item.title: Five years of rackerhacker.com
item.description: Today marks the fifth year that this blog has existed on the internet.

item.title: You might see me on CNN Money soon
item.description: A videographer from CNN Money stopped by the office today to ask about what makes Rackspace a unique place to work.

item.title: Xen Summit 2011: My Takeways
item.description: Quite a few people who couldn’t make it to Xen Summit 2011 this year asked me to write a post summarizing my takeaways from the event.

item.title: Taking a short posting break
item.description: I’ll be taking a short break from posting, but I should be back underway within week!

item.title: Hosting the politicians
item.description: Call me weird - but I like to know where people host their sites.

item.title: MySQLTuner reaches 5,000 downloads!
item.description: I’ve just reviewed the stats for MySQLTuner, and it crossed the 5,000 download mark last week!

item.title: Have a great 2008
item.description: I’d like to wish everyone a Happy New Year and I hope it is a great 2008 for you all!

item.title: Taking a little time off
item.description: I’m taking a little bit of time off for Christmas, but I’ll be adding new posts on December 31st.

item.title: Happy Thanksgiving
item.description: In the US, we celebrate Thanksgiving today.

item.title: A short vacation
item.description: I’ve been on a bit of a vacation lately, and that’s why there’s been a lack of updates.

item.description: So, you might be saying: “where the heck are the updates for RackerHacker lately?

item.title: Happy Labor Day
item.description: In the spirit of Labor Day, there will be no new items today.
